title: Burford-O'Neal-Taniguchi Endowed Scholarship Fund for ECM
description: To provide scholarship support for undergraduate or graduate students pursuing a degree in the College of Music at CU Boulder and who are seeking a certificate in the Entrepreneurship Center for Music, a business minor, or similar degree.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support for undergraduate or graduate students pursuing a degree in the College of Music at CU Boulder and who are seeking a certificate in the Entrepreneurship Center for Music, a business minor, or similar degree.
